entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer config discovery doesn't work when all source files are generated #66051

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Delete dead MSBuild conditions #66052
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #66050
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge 'main' into 'PrimaryConstructors' #66053
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind and emit Primary Constructor #65899
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Display postfix `await` completions as snippets #66015
    Area-IDE, Community
